practice Package¶

practice Package¶

This practice module is the heart of what this project is all about. This is a space for me (and others if they’d like) to practice their python v3.5 programming.

Ideally, this will use ‘best practices’ which includes keeping this Sphinx-based documentation up to date and ensuring there are good tests in place.

generate_sphinx Module¶

sphinx-autopackage-script

I copied this from https://bitbucket.org/etienned/sphinx-autopackage-script/src

This script parses a directory tree looking for python modules and packages and creates ReST files appropriately to create code documentation with Sphinx. It also creates a modules index (named modules.<suffix>).

practice.generate_sphinx.create_module_file(package, module, opts)[source]¶

Build the text of the file and write the file.

practice.generate_sphinx.create_modules_toc_file(master_package, modules, opts, name='modules')[source]¶

Create the module’s index.

practice.generate_sphinx.create_package_file(root, master_package, subroot, py_files, opts, subs)[source]¶

Build the text of the file and write the file.

practice.generate_sphinx.format_directive(module, package=None)[source]¶

Create the automodule directive and add the options.

practice.generate_sphinx.format_heading(level, text)[source]¶

Create a heading of <level> [1, 2 or 3 supported].

practice.generate_sphinx.is_excluded(root, excludes)[source]¶

Check if the directory is in the exclude list.

Note: by having trailing slashes, we avoid common prefix issues, like
e.g. an exlude “foo” also accidentally excluding “foobar”.
practice.generate_sphinx.main()[source]¶

Parse and check the command line arguments.

practice.generate_sphinx.makename(package, module)[source]¶

Join package and module with a dot.

practice.generate_sphinx.normalize_excludes(rootpath, excludes)[source]¶

Normalize the excluded directory list: * must be either an absolute path or start with rootpath, * otherwise it is joined with rootpath * with trailing slash

practice.generate_sphinx.recurse_tree(path, excludes, opts)[source]¶

Look for every file in the directory tree and create the corresponding ReST files.

practice.generate_sphinx.shall_skip(module)[source]¶

Check if we want to skip this module.

practice.generate_sphinx.write_file(name, text, opts)[source]¶

Write the output file for module/package <name>.
